section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The initial ongoing damage increases to 15, and the maximum to 35.

feat.title: Bogtangle Warrior
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency with the blowgun, and your blowgun damage increases from 1d4 to 1d6.
Also, you can swap one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers for the bogtangle dart attack power.

power.title: Bogtangle Dart
power.fluff: An enemy struck by your dart feels a spreading numbness as the venom does its work

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a blowgun

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity or Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] poison damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
If the target is already slowed, it becomes immobilized until the end of your next turn instead.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] poison damage.

feat.title: Bola Training
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency with the bola.
When you make a Weapon attack with your bola and hit, you can forgo dealing damage to the target to immobilize it until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, the target is also knocked prone.
In addition, you can learn the following powers as multiclass powers of the indicated level:

power.title: Binding Bola
power.fluff: The weights entwine the cords around your target, wrapping it so tightly that it cannot maintain its momentum

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is also knocked prone.

section.name: Level 17:
section.text: If you know this power as an encounter attack power of 17th level or higher, the damage increases to 4[W] + Dexterity.

power.title: Bola Recovery
power.fluff: With the bola back in hand, you ready it for another precise throw

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must know the binding bola power

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain the use of your binding bola power.

power.title: Felling Bola
power.fluff: Such is the force of your throw, that your foe is knocked down it finds too painful stand back up again

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage and the target is knocked prone.
The target cannot stand up from prone (save ends).

section.name: Level 25:
section.text: If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the damage increases to 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is knocked prone.
The target cannot stand from prone until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Bold Gamble
feat.benefit: Whenever you spend an action point to gain an extra action and use it to make an attack, you can choose to take a gamble. If you do, you gain a benefit based on whether the attack hits or not.
If the attack hits, the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.
If the attack misses, you grant combat advantage to the target until the end of your next turn.
If your attack targets more than one creature, apply the gamble separately to each one.

feat.title: Bold Spirit
feat.benefit: When you are hit by a melee attack while you are either bloodied or granting combat advantage to the attacker, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Boldness Through Luck
feat.benefit: If an enemy has combat advantage against you and misses with a melee attack, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the start of its next turn.

feat.title: Bolstered Swarm
feat.benefit: When you use your wild shape to change from your humanoid form to beast form, you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 10 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Admixture
feat.benefit: When you use your curative admixture class power, the target can make a saving throw to end one ongoing effect that a save can end.

feat.title: Bolstering Breath
feat.benefit: Your dragon breath's attack targets only enemies instead of all creatures in the area.
In addition, allies in the area of your dragon breath gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Bolstering Guardian
feat.benefit: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or less with a Druid attack power, one ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.
The temporary hit points increase to 8 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Inspiration
feat.benefit: If an ally is adjacent to you when they use the Draw Inspiration action of your warlord's aura power, you can take a free interrupt to either increase the healing by your Wisdom modifier or to allow the ally to make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
The increased healing becomes 4 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and 8 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Mantle
feat.benefit: Whenever you spend a healing surge, choose one ally within the radius of your Ardent Mantle. The chosen ally can either gain 5 temporary hit points or make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
The temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Spike
feat.benefit: When you use your mind spike class power, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
The temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Touch
feat.benefit: When you use your lay on hands on an ally, the target can use your healing surge value instead of his or her own healing surge value to determine amount of healing.

feat.title: Bolstering Wind
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, each bloodied ally within the radius of your Ardent Mantle regains hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.
The hit points regained increase to 10 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bonded Familiar
feat.benefit: You and your familiar can communicate telepathically out to a range of 10 squares. You must have line of sight and line of effect to your familiar to communicate with it in this manner.
At 11th level, you can communicate out to a range of 50 squares. You can communicate out to a range of 10 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect.

At 21st level, you can communicate out to a range of 1 mile. You can communicate out to a range of 50 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect, and to a range of 10 squares even if you have neither.

feat.title: Boon of the Made
feat.benefit: When you use your elan resilience power, you also gain resistance to all damage equal to your Intelligence modifier until the start of the triggering enemy's next turn.
This resistance increases to 3 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Born in Darkness
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Dungeoneering and Perception checks.
In addition, you gain low-light vision.

feat.title: Born of Shadows
feat.benefit: Your origin changes to shadow.
Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Stealth
In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws while in dim light or darkness.

feat.title: Born of the Elements
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Endurance and Intimidate checks.
In addition, you can speak, read and write primordial.

feat.title: Boundless Enthusiasm
feat.benefit: The first time during an encounter that you score a critical hit, you regain 2 power points.

feat.title: Bountiful Fortune
feat.benefit: When you use your divine fortune, you and each ally adjacent to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
The temporary hit points increase to 2 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 5 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bow Caster
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency in bows as an implement.

feat.title: Bow Expertise
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to Weapon damage rolls with a bow when you attack a single target that is not adjacent to any creatures.
The damage bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bow Mastery
feat.benefit: When you make a Weapon attack with a bow or crossbow, you can score a critical hit with a natural roll of 19 or 20.

feat.title: Bozak Evoker
feat.benefit: If you score a critical hit with an arcane attack power, the target falls prone.
In addition, while you are bloodied, you double your racial damage bonus from the Arcane Blood racial trait.

feat.title: Bracing Breath
feat.benefit: When you use your dragon breath racial power, you gain the following benefits until the end of your next turn:
► You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with melee powers that grant temporary hit points to you.
► You count as having spent an additional healing surge for powers with varying benefits based on how many you have spent.

feat.title: Bravo
feat.benefit: You gain training in Intimidate.
Once per encounter, you can designate one creature you can see as your prey until the end of the encounter. If your prey is a solo creature, this is (save ends).
You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and Intimidate checks against your prey.
This bonus increases to +2 when your prey is under a Fear effect from you.
In addition, you can learn the following powers as multiclass powers of the indicated level:

power.title: Death's Messenger
power.fluff: Your prey has an appointment with death, and your attack reminds it of the fact

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You target your prey with an at-will melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] additional damage, or +1d8 additional damage if the attack is not a Weapon attack.
On a hit, the target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 17:
section.text: If you know this power as an encounter attack power of 17th level or higher, the additional damage increases to +2[W], or +2d8 if the attack is not a Weapon attack.

power.title: Brutal Instincts
power.fluff: With your defiant snarl, the advantage your foes had evaporates, giving you an opening

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Any creatures flank you, or your prey gains combat advantage against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You do not grant combat advantage to the triggering creature or creatures until the end of your next turn.
If your prey was among those who triggered this power, you gain combat advantage against your prey until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Bravo's Finish
power.fluff: If your vicious assault doesn't bring your prey down, it is rattled to its core

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit your prey with an at-will attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage, or +1d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack, and your prey is dazed (save ends).

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage (save ends).

section.name: Level 25:
section.text: If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the triggering attack deals +4[W] damage, or +4d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack.

feat.title: Bravura Leader
feat.benefit: When an ally who can see and hear you spends an action point to make an attack, that ally can choose to make the attack with bravado.
If the ally does, he or she deals +4 additional damage with the attack, but grants combat advantage to any target of the attack until the end of his or her next turn.

feat.title: Bravura Shroud
feat.benefit: Whenever an ally chooses to benefit from your Bravura Leader feat, that ally gains concealment until the end of his or her next turn.

feat.title: Bravura Spirit
feat.benefit: Whenever a bloodied ally chooses to benefit from your Bravura Leader feat, that ally gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls for the attack.

feat.title: Breath of Life
feat.benefit: Your dragon breath racial power targets only enemies for the attack.
In addition, allies within the area gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier or your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Strength modifier or your Consitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Strength modifier or your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Breath of the Gods
feat.benefit: Your dragon breath racial power counts as a divine encounter attack power for the purposes of your Covenant Manifestation feature.
In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Diplomacy checks.

feat.title: Breath-Resistant Beast
feat.benefit: Your beast companion gains resist 5 + one-half your level to the damage type of your dragon breath racial power.

If you can choose between different damage types when using your dragon breath racial power, choose one of those damage types for your beast companion to resist at the end of an extended rest. If your dragon breath racial power can deal more than one type of damage at once, your beast companion can resist a similar combination.

feat.title: Bred for Battle
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative checks.
During the first round of an encounter, you also gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and speed.

feat.title: Briar Thorns
feat.benefit: Whenever you deal ongoing damage to an enemy, the enemy is slowed until the ongoing damage ends.

feat.title: Brilliant Darkfire
feat.benefit: When you hit a target with your darkfire racial power, the target gains vulnerability to radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
This vulnerability increases to 2 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Brimming Wrath
feat.benefit: When you use your furious assault racial power and have at least 1 power point, each enemy marked by you takes psychic damage equal to your Strength modifier.
This psychic damage increases to 2 + your Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Strength modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Broadened Preservation
feat.benefit: You can slide one or two allies with your Covenant Manifestation.

feat.title: Broken Shackles
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to your Will defense.
In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against Charm and Fear effects.

feat.title: Brutal Accuracy
feat.benefit: If the rerolled attack granted by your elven accuracy racial power hits your quarry, the attack deals extra damage equal to 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier.
This extra damage increases to 2d6 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Advantage
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage against a target but don't use Sneak Attack against it, your attack deals additional damage equal to your Strength modifier.

feat.title: Brutal Blades
feat.benefit: Your unarmed attack gains the Off-hand weapon property.
In addition, the damage dice for your razor storm increase from d6s to d8s.

feat.title: Brutal Brawler
feat.benefit: The damage die of your unarmed attack increases to 1d8.

Also, your damage die for spiked gauntlets increases to 1d8 and you count it as having the High Crit weapon property: additional +1[W] damage on a critical hit, increasing to +2[W] at 11th level, and to +3[W] at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Charge
feat.benefit: When you use your ferocious charge racial power, you can choose to use an encounter melee attack power instead of making a melee basic attack.

feat.title: Brutal Curse
feat.benefit: When you roll your additional curse damage, reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher.

feat.title: Brutal Ferocity
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls of the melee basic attack granted by your Ferocity racial trait.
The bonus to damage rolls increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Finish
feat.benefit: Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or less using an encounter or daily attack power, each enemy adjacent to you or the triggering enemy takes a -2 penalty to its Will defense until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Brutal Flanker
feat.benefit: While you flank an enemy and wield a two-handed weapon, any ally making a melee attack against the flanked enemy can reroll any damage die that displays a 1. The ally can reroll each die once.

feat.title: Brutal Flurry
feat.benefit: Whenever you target only one creature with your Flurry of Blows power, the creature takes 3 extra damage.
The extra damage increases to 5 at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Grappler Form
feat.benefit: While you are in beast form, you gain a +6 feat bonus to grab attempts.
This bonus increases to +8 at 21st level.
In addition, any target you are grabbing while in beast form grants you combat advantage.

feat.title: Brutal Reach
feat.benefit: When you are raging and wielding a two-handed reach weapon, you can reroll any weapon damage die that displays a 1 when making melee attacks.

feat.title: Brutal Ruffian
feat.benefit: When you wield a club or a mace, you treat the weapon as though it had the Brutal 1 property: reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher.

feat.title: Brutal Shroud
feat.benefit: Whenever you roll the damage for your shroud, reroll each die that shows a 1 until it shows a different number.

feat.title: Brutal Teamwork
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Weapon damage rolls when adjacent to at least one ally. The bonus applies to melee attacks, as well as to ranged attacks with a Heavy Thrown weapon.
The bonus increases to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Wound
feat.benefit: When your attack deals ongoing damage and you deal Sneak Attack damage to the target, add 1 to the ongoing damage for every die of Sneak Attack damage dealt.

feat.title: Brute Force
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy with a melee Weapon daily attack, you can also push the target 1 square and knock the target prone.
The push increases to 2 squares at 21st level.

feat.title: Buckler Duelist
feat.benefit: If you gain a bonus to a defense from a Rogue power and are wielding a light shield, increase the bonus by 1.

feat.title: Buffeting Shard Swarm
feat.benefit: When you use your shard swarm racial power, you can also slide each enemy in the burst 1 square.
If you have the Expanded Shard Swarm feat, you can slide each enemy adjacent to you 2 squares instead.

feat.title: Buffeting Winds
feat.benefit: When you use your windwalker racial power, you can slide each enemy marked by you a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Building Camaraderie
feat.benefit: When you succeed on a Diplomacy check, you gain a +1 bonus to Diplomacy checks until the end of the encounter. This bonus is cumulative with itself.
When you fail a Diplomacy check or a Bluff check, attempt an Intimidate check, or perform any hostile action, you lose any bonus from this feat and cannot gain the bonus again during this encounter.

feat.title: Burden of Guardianship
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power and an ally is within 2 squares of you, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier.
The ally can be within 3 squares starting at 21st level.
The temporary hit points increase to 5 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Burden of Liberty
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power, you can teleport one ally within 5 squares of you to a square adjacent to you.

feat.title: Burden of Rejuvenation
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power, you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.
Starting at 11th level, you can choose instead to spend a healing surge to allow an ally within 5 squares of you to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge.

feat.title: Burden of Vision
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power, you gain blindsight 10 until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Burn Everything
feat.benefit: Your arcane Fire powers ignore an amount of fire resistance. The amount equals one-half the ability modifier of the ability you use to make the attack.
The amount you ignore increases by 5 at 11th level, and by 10 at 21st level.
In addition, you treat a creature that is immune to fire as instead having resist fire equal to 10 + its level.

feat.title: Burning Blizzard
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage with powers that have the Acid or Cold keyword.
This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Burning Breath
feat.benefit: Choose one creature you hit with your fire damage-dealing dragon breath racial power.
The chosen creature takes ongoing fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
This ongoing damage increases to 5 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Burning Vapors
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 feat bonus to acid damage rolls.
This bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.
In addition, whenever you take acid damage from an attack, each enemy adjacent to you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Burning Wrath of Phlegethos
feat.benefit: If you use your infernal wrath racial power against your oath target, your melee attacks against that target deal additioal fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
The additional damage increases to 2 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Burst of Savagery
feat.benefit: While you are under your razorclaw shifting or longtooth shifting racial power, you can choose to end it as a free interrupt when you hit with an attack.
If you do, you deal an additional 2d6 damage to the triggering target and gain 10 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points.

feat.title: Butcher's Lure
feat.benefit: You gain the ghost sound Cantrip as a racial utility power.
In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to Bluff checks when using ghost sound to mimic specific people or sounds.

power.title: Ghost Sound
power.fluff: With a wink, you create an illusory sound that emanates from a distant location

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Ranged 15

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Ranged 20

section.name: Target:
section.text: One object or unoccupied square

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You cause a sound as quiet as a whisper or as loud as a yelling or fighting creature to emanate from the target.

You can produce nonvocal sounds such as the ringing of a sword blow, jingling armor, or scraping stone. If you produce a whisper, you can make it quiet enough that only creatures adjacent to the target can hear the words.

feat.title: Call to Glory
feat.benefit: Whenever you grant an ally an attack by using a Warlord power, that ally gains temporary hit points if the attack hits.
The temporary hit points equal one-half your level.

feat.title: Camouflage
feat.benefit: When you have any natural cover or concealment outdoors, you gain a +5 feat bonus to Stealth checks to hide.

feat.title: Carceri's Manacles
feat.benefit: When an enemy ends its turn adjacent to a creature you have summoned, it is slowed until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Careful Summoner
feat.benefit: Creatures summoned by your powers gain a +1 bonus to all defenses.

feat.title: Carrior Eater
feat.benefit: You gain a +4 feat bonus to saving throws against Poison effects, and to Endurance checks to resist disease.

feat.title: Cascading Doom
feat.benefit: When you affect more than one enemy with your maledictor's doom Channel Divinity power, each enemy affected gains vulnerability to all damage equal to twice the number of enemies affected. The vulnerability lasts until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Cascading Rush
feat.benefit: Whenever you push a target with bull rush, you can also push one enemy adjacent to that target 1 square.
The second enemy can be adjacent to the target either before or after you resolve the bull rush.

feat.title: Cast Afar the Spirit
feat.benefit: When you switch your familiar into active mode, you can teleport it 5 squares.

feat.title: Cast Aside
feat.benefit: Whenever a Medium or smaller creature succeeds in escaping from being grabbed by you, you can use an opportunity interrupt with the following effect:
Effect: You cancel the shift that would normally be part of the escape, and slide the target 3 squares.

feat.title: Cast Iron Font
feat.benefit: When you succeed at a saving throw against a Poison effect at the start of your turn, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Censure's Grip
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage against your oath target and hit it with an Avenger power, the target cannot shift away from you until the end of your next turn.
Starting at 21st level, each square of movement away from you the target takes costs an additional square of movement.

feat.title: Centered Intuition
feat.benefit: When you roll initiative, you can roll twice and use either result. If you roll the same number both times, you can choose gain a +5 bonus to the check.

feat.title: Centered Master
feat.benefit: Your centered flurry of blows can slide each target 2 squares instead of 1.

feat.title: Champion of Nature
feat.benefit: Each time you take a short rest and expend at least one healing surge to regain hit points, choose an aspect of nature that you aren't currently manifesting.
You can use the chosen aspect's power in addition to your current aspect's power. You can't use this feat to gain additional uses of the same aspect of nature power.

feat.title: Champion of Raam
feat.benefit: In addition to regaining the use of your fell might, whenever you drop an enemy you have cursed to 0 hit points or less, you can shift a number of squares equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier.

You can also expend your fell might to augment any power associated with this feat. When you hit an enemy with an augmented such power, the target cannot include you as a target in its attacks until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Champion of the Bloody Circle
feat.benefit: You gain training in your choice of Intimidate or Streetwise.
In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate and Streetwise checks.

feat.title: Champion's Countenance
feat.benefit: While you are at maximum hit points, allies that can see you gain a +2 bonus to their Fortitude, Reflex and Will defenses.
Allies also gain this bonus until the start of your next turn when you use your second wind to become non-bloodied.

feat.title: Changeling's Mark
feat.benefit: You can expend your changeling trick racial power to mark each enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn. This replaces the power's normal target and effect.

feat.title: Channel Might
feat.benefit: After you use a Channel Divinity power, you gain a +1 power bonus to the next melee attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Channel of Faith
feat.benefit: You gain the Cleric Channel Divinity power divine fortune and a Channel Divinity power from one of your domains.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channel of Invocation
feat.benefit: You gain an Invoker Channel Divinity power corresponding to one of the Divine Covenants, and a Channel Divinity power corresponding to your deity.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channel of Valor
feat.benefit: You gain the Paladin Channel Divinity powers divine mettle and divine strength.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channel of Vengeance
feat.benefit: You gain the Avenger Channel Divinity power divine guidance and a Channel Divinity power corresponding to your deity.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channeled Battlerage
feat.benefit: When you hit with a melee attack, you can choose to lose all temporary hit points to reroll the damage and gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to the number of healing surges you have expended.

feat.title: Charging Admixture
feat.benefit: When you use your curative admixture power, the target gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls on charge attacks until the end of your next turn.
The damage bonus increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Charging Aegis
feat.benefit: When you use a charge attack and hit the enemy, you can use your aegis on it as a nonaction reaction before you turn ends.
If you do so, the penalty to attack rolls imposed by your mark is -3 instead of -2.

feat.title: Charging Rampage
feat.benefit: When your Savage Rampage feat triggers, you can choose to charge instead of making a melee basic attack.

feat.title: Cheetah's Speed
feat.benefit: While you are in beast form, you gain a +1 bonus to speed, or a +2 bonus when you run or charge.
While you are bloodied, these bonuses increase to +2 and +4, respectively.

feat.title: Child of Fire
feat.benefit: Whenever an attack bloodies you or knocks you unconscious, one enemy of your choice within 2 squares of you takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
The fire damage increases to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Child of Stone
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind while on an earthen or stone surface, you also gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
This resistance increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Child of the Maelstorm
feat.benefit: Whenever you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you gain a +2 bonus to your next saving throw during this encounter.

feat.title: Child of the Sea
feat.benefit: You gain a swim speed equal to your speed.
In addition, you gain Aquatic keyword. In aquatic combat, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against nonaquatic creatures.

feat.title: Child of Wind
feat.benefit: Whenever you run or charge and are not wearing heavy armor, you ignore difficult terrain.

feat.title: Chill of the Grave
feat.benefit: Your dark reaping racial power gains Cold keyword and deals cold damage in addition to necrotic damage.

feat.title: Chilling Oath
feat.benefit: When you use your oath of enmity class power, the target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Chilling Presence
feat.benefit: When you use your winter's shroud heritage power, you can deal 5 cold damage to the triggering enemy instead of teleporting.
This damage increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Chosen Defender
feat.benefit: Enemies adjacent to you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls on opportunity attacks against your allies.
Starting at 21st level, the penalty applis to all triggered attack rolls.

feat.title: Clarified Instincts
feat.benefit: The bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks granted by your Mantle of Clarity increases by one-half your Wisdom modifier.

feat.title: Clarifying Infusion
feat.benefit: When you use a Healing Infusion power, the target can make a saving throw against a dazing or dominating condition that a save can end.

feat.title: Clarifying Presence
feat.benefit: When an ally within your telepathy range makes a saving throw against an effect that dazes, dominates or stuns, he or she can roll twice and use either result.

feat.title: Clarity of Spirit
feat.benefit: When you use your bastion of mental clarity racial power, you or one ally in the burst can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

feat.title: Claw Fighter
feat.benefit: You have claws on both hands which count as weapons that are in the light blade weapon group, have the Off-hand property and a +3 proficiency bonus, and deal 1d6 damage.
You can wield a claw as a weapon when you aren't holding anything in the hand.
Your claws can be enchanted and disenchanted as a single weapon. Your claws do not turn to dust when disenchanted.

feat.title: Cleanse the Madness
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to damage against aberrant creatures.
This bonus increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Cleansing Challenge
feat.benefit: When you use your divine challenge class power to mark an undead creature, you also deal 3 radiant damage to that creature.
The radiant damage increases to 6 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Cleaving Axe
feat.benefit: Once per round when you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or less with an axe, you can make a melee basic attack as a free reaction.

feat.title: Clever Control
feat.benefit: Whenever you target two or more creatures with a close or area attack power and only hit one of those creatures, the attack deals 1d6 extra damage.
The extra damage increases to 2d6 at 11th level, and to 3d6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Clever Tail
feat.benefit: Once per round as a free action, you can draw or stow an object weighing 1 pound or less with your tail.
You can use your tail to make Thievery checks, including using thieves' tools.
This feat does not give you the ability to make attacks with your tail.

feat.title: Savage Rampage
feat.benefit: Once per round when you are raging and score a critical hit with a Barbarian attack power, you can make a melee basic as a free reaction.
If you are wielding more than one weapon, you must make the attack with the same weapon.

feat.title: Spellplague Sense
feat.benefit: You know when you're within 5 squares of something touched by the Spellplague, such as an area affected by it, a plaguetouched creature, or a creature with a spellscar. You can sense the presence of the source, but not the direction or distance.
You also gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks.
